verses.text: \w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Saul|strong="G4569"\w*, \w yet|strong="G2089"\w* breathing \w out|strong="G1709"\w* \w threatenings|strong="G0547"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w slaughter|strong="G5408"\w* \w against|strong="G1519"\w* the \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, went \w unto|strong="G4334"\w* the high \w priest|strong="G0749"\w*,

And \w desired|strong="G0154"\w* \w of|strong="G3844"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w letters|strong="G1992"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Damascus|strong="G1154"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* the \w synagogues|strong="G4864"\w*, \w that|strong="G3704"\w* \w if|strong="G1437"\w* he \w found|strong="G2147"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* of this \w way|strong="G3598"\w*, \w whether|strong="G5037"\w* they \w were|strong="G5607"\w* \w men|strong="G0435"\w* \w or|strong="G2532"\w* \w women|strong="G1135"\w*, he might \w bring|strong="G0071"\w* them \w bound|strong="G1210"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w as|strong="G1722"\w* he \w journeyed|strong="G4198"\w*, \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w came|strong="G1096"\w* \w near|strong="G1448"\w* \w Damascus|strong="G1154"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w suddenly|strong="G1810"\w* there shined round \w about|strong="G4015"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* a \w light|strong="G5457"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*:

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w fell|strong="G4098"\w* \w to|strong="G1909"\w* the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*, and \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* a \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* \w saying|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Saul|strong="G4549"\+w*, \+w Saul|strong="G4549"\+w*, \+w why|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w persecutest thou|strong="G1377"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3165"\+w*?\wj*

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* he \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w Who|strong="G5101"\w* art \w thou|strong="G1488"\w*, \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*? \w And|strong="G1161"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \wj  \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w am|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w Jesus|strong="G2424"\+w* \+w whom|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w thou|strong="G4771"\+w* \+w persecutest|strong="G1377"\+w*: \+add it is\+add* \+w hard|strong="G4642"\+w* \+w for thee|strong="G4671"\+w* \+w to kick|strong="G2979"\+w* \+w against|strong="G4314"\+w* \+w the pricks|strong="G2759"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G5037"\w* he \w trembling|strong="G5141"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w astonished|strong="G2284"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w what|strong="G5101"\w* wilt \w thou|strong="G2309"\w* \w have|strong="G4160"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w* to \w do|strong="G4160"\w*? \w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \add said\add* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Arise|strong="G0450"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w go|strong="G1525"\+w* \+w into|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w the city|strong="G4172"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w it shall be told|strong="G2980"\+w* \+w thee|strong="G4671"\+w* \+w what|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w thou|strong="G4571"\+w* \+w must|strong="G1163"\+w* \+w do|strong="G4160"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* the \w men|strong="G0435"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w journeyed|strong="G4922"\w* with \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w stood|strong="G2476"\w* \w speechless|strong="G1769"\w*, \w hearing|strong="G0191"\w* a \w voice|strong="G5456"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w seeing|strong="G2334"\w* no \w man|strong="G3367"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Saul|strong="G4569"\w* \w arose|strong="G1453"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*; and \w when|strong="G1161"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w eyes|strong="G3788"\w* were \w opened|strong="G0455"\w*, he \w saw|strong="G0991"\w* no \w man|strong="G3762"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* they \w led|strong="G5496"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* by the \w hand|strong="G5496"\w*, and \w brought|strong="G1521"\w* \add him\add* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w Damascus|strong="G1154"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w three|strong="G5140"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w* \w without|strong="G3361"\w* \w sight|strong="G0991"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w neither|strong="G3756"\w* did \w eat|strong="G5315"\w* \w nor|strong="G3761"\w* \w drink|strong="G4095"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G1161"\w* there \w was|strong="G2258"\w* a \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w disciple|strong="G3101"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w Damascus|strong="G1154"\w*, \w named|strong="G3686"\w* \w Ananias|strong="G0367"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* a \w vision|strong="G3705"\w*, \wj  \+w Ananias|strong="G0367"\+w*.\wj* \w And|strong="G1161"\w* he \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w Behold|strong="G2400"\w*, \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \add am here\add*, \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \add said\add* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Arise|strong="G0450"\+w*, \+w and go|strong="G4198"\+w* \+w into|strong="G1909"\+w* \+w the street|strong="G4505"\+w* \+w which|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w is called|strong="G2564"\+w* \+w Straight|strong="G2117"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w enquire|strong="G2212"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w the house|strong="G3614"\+w* \+w of Judas|strong="G2455"\+w* \+w for|strong="G2212"\+w* \+add one\+add* \+w called|strong="G3686"\+w* \+w Saul|strong="G4569"\+w*, \+w of Tarsus|strong="G5018"\+w*: \+w for|strong="G1063"\+w*, \+w behold|strong="G2400"\+w*, \+w he prayeth|strong="G4336"\+w*,\wj*

\wj  \+w And|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w hath seen|strong="G1492"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w a vision|strong="G3705"\+w* \+w a man|strong="G0435"\+w* \+w named|strong="G3686"\+w* \+w Ananias|strong="G0367"\+w* \+w coming in|strong="G1525"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w putting|strong="G2007"\+w* \+add his\+add* \+w hand|strong="G5495"\+w* \+w on him|strong="G0846"\+w*, \+w that|strong="G3704"\+w* \+w he might receive his sight|strong="G0308"\+w*.\wj*

\w Then|strong="G1161"\w* \w Ananias|strong="G0367"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w*, \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, I have \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \w by|strong="G0575"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w this|strong="G5127"\w* \w man|strong="G0435"\w*, how \w much|strong="G3745"\w* \w evil|strong="G2556"\w* he hath \w done|strong="G4160"\w* to \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w saints|strong="G0040"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\w*:

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w here|strong="G5602"\w* he \w hath|strong="G2192"\w* \w authority|strong="G1849"\w* \w from|strong="G3844"\w* the chief \w priests|strong="G0749"\w* to \w bind|strong="G1210"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* that call \w on|strong="G1941"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w name|strong="G3686"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Go thy way|strong="G4198"\+w*: \+w for|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w he|strong="G3778"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w a chosen|strong="G1589"\+w* \+w vessel|strong="G4632"\+w* \+w unto me|strong="G3427"\+w*, \+w to bear|strong="G0941"\+w* \+w my|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w name|strong="G3686"\+w* \+w before|strong="G1799"\+w* \+w the Gentiles|strong="G1484"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w kings|strong="G0935"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G5037"\+w* \+w the children|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w of Israel|strong="G2474"\+w*:\wj*

\wj  \+w For|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w will shew|strong="G5263"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w how great things|strong="G3745"\+w* \+w he|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w must|strong="G1163"\+w* \+w suffer|strong="G3958"\+w* \+w for|strong="G5228"\+w* \+w my|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w name’s sake|strong="G3686"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Ananias|strong="G0367"\w* went his \w way|strong="G0565"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w entered|strong="G1525"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w house|strong="G3614"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* putting \w his|strong="G2007"\w* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w Brother|strong="G0080"\w* \w Saul|strong="G4549"\w*, the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \add even\add* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w appeared|strong="G3700"\w* unto \w thee|strong="G4671"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w way|strong="G3598"\w* \w as|strong="G3739"\w* thou \w camest|strong="G2064"\w*, hath \w sent|strong="G0649"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w*, \w that|strong="G3704"\w* thou mightest receive thy \w sight|strong="G0308"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* be \w filled|strong="G4130"\w* with the \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w Ghost|strong="G4151"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w immediately|strong="G2112"\w* there \w fell|strong="G0634"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w eyes|strong="G3788"\w* as it had \w been|strong="G5616"\w* \w scales|strong="G3013"\w*: \w and|strong="G5037"\w* he received \w sight|strong="G0308"\w* \w forthwith|strong="G3916"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w arose|strong="G0450"\w*, and was \w baptized|strong="G0907"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* when he had \w received|strong="G2983"\w* \w meat|strong="G5160"\w*, he was \w strengthened|strong="G1765"\w*. \w Then|strong="G1161"\w* \w was|strong="G1096"\w* \w Saul|strong="G4569"\w* \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* the \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* which \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w Damascus|strong="G1154"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w straightway|strong="G2112"\w* he \w preached|strong="G2784"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w synagogues|strong="G4864"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w he|strong="G3778"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \add him\add* were \w amazed|strong="G1839"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*; \w Is|strong="G2076"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* he \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w destroyed|strong="G4199"\w* them \w which|strong="G3588"\w* called \w on|strong="G1941"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* \w name|strong="G3686"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w hither|strong="G5602"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* that \w intent|strong="G5124"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* he might \w bring|strong="G0071"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w bound|strong="G1210"\w* \w unto|strong="G1909"\w* the chief \w priests|strong="G0749"\w*?

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w Saul|strong="G4569"\w* \w increased|strong="G1743"\w* the \w more|strong="G3123"\w* in \w strength|strong="G1743"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w confounded|strong="G4797"\w* the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w dwelt|strong="G2730"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w Damascus|strong="G1154"\w*, \w proving|strong="G4822"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w very|strong="G3588"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G1161"\w* after \w that|strong="G5613"\w* \w many|strong="G2425"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w* were \w fulfilled|strong="G4137"\w*, the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* took \w counsel|strong="G4823"\w* to \w kill|strong="G0337"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*:

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* laying \w await|strong="G1917"\w* was \w known|strong="G1097"\w* of \w Saul|strong="G4569"\w*. \w And|strong="G5037"\w* they \w watched|strong="G3906"\w* the \w gates|strong="G4439"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w night|strong="G3571"\w* \w to|strong="G3704"\w* \w kill|strong="G0337"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G1161"\w* the \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w took|strong="G2983"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* by \w night|strong="G3571"\w*, and \w let|strong="G2524"\w* \add him\add* \w down|strong="G5465"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w wall|strong="G5038"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* a \w basket|strong="G4711"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* when \w Saul|strong="G4569"\w* was \w come|strong="G3854"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\w*, he \w assayed|strong="G3987"\w* to join \w himself|strong="G2853"\w* to the \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*: \w but|strong="G2532"\w* they \w were|strong="G5399"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w afraid|strong="G5399"\w* of \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, and \w believed|strong="G4100"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* he \w was|strong="G2076"\w* a \w disciple|strong="G3101"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w Barnabas|strong="G0921"\w* \w took|strong="G1949"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, and \w brought|strong="G0071"\w* \add him\add* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* the \w apostles|strong="G0652"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w declared|strong="G1334"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w how|strong="G4459"\w* he had \w seen|strong="G1492"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w way|strong="G3598"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* he had spoken \w to|strong="G2980"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w how|strong="G4459"\w* he had preached \w boldly|strong="G3955"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w Damascus|strong="G1154"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w name|strong="G3686"\w* of \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* coming \w in|strong="G1531"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* going \w out|strong="G1607"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he spake \w boldly|strong="G3955"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w name|strong="G3686"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w and|strong="G5037"\w* \w disputed|strong="G4802"\w* \w against|strong="G4314"\w* the \w Grecians|strong="G1675"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* they went \w about|strong="G2021"\w* to \w slay|strong="G0337"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\add Which\add* \w when|strong="G1161"\w* the \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w* \w knew|strong="G1921"\w*, they \w brought|strong="G2609"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w down|strong="G2609"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Cæsarea|strong="G2542"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w sent|strong="G1821"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w forth|strong="G1821"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Tarsus|strong="G5019"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G3767"\w* \w had|strong="G2192"\w* the \w churches|strong="G1577"\w* \w rest|strong="G1515"\w* \w throughout|strong="G2596"\w* \w all|strong="G3650"\w* \w Judæa|strong="G2449"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Galilee|strong="G1056"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Samaria|strong="G4540"\w*, and were \w edified|strong="G3618"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w walking|strong="G4198"\w* in the \w fear|strong="G5401"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* in the \w comfort|strong="G3874"\w* of the \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w Ghost|strong="G4151"\w*, were \w multiplied|strong="G4129"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G1161"\w* it came to \w pass|strong="G1096"\w*, as \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w passed|strong="G1330"\w* \w throughout|strong="G1223"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \add quarters\add*, he came \w down|strong="G2718"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* the \w saints|strong="G0040"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w dwelt|strong="G2730"\w* at \w Lydda|strong="G3069"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w there|strong="G1563"\w* he \w found|strong="G2147"\w* a \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w named|strong="G3686"\w* \w Æneas|strong="G0132"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* had kept \w his|strong="G2621"\w* \w bed|strong="G2895"\w* \w eight|strong="G3638"\w* \w years|strong="G2094"\w*, and \w was|strong="G2258"\w* sick of the \w palsy|strong="G3886"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Æneas|strong="G0132"\w*, \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w maketh|strong="G2390"\w* \w thee|strong="G4571"\w* \w whole|strong="G2390"\w*: \w arise|strong="G0450"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w make|strong="G4766"\w* \w thy|strong="G4572"\w* \w bed|strong="G4766"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w arose|strong="G0450"\w* \w immediately|strong="G2112"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w that|strong="G3748"\w* \w dwelt|strong="G2730"\w* at \w Lydda|strong="G3069"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Saron|strong="G4565"\w* \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, and \w turned|strong="G1994"\w* \w to|strong="G1909"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*.

¶ \w Now|strong="G1161"\w* there \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w Joppa|strong="G2445"\w* a \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w disciple|strong="G3102"\w* \w named|strong="G3686"\w* \w Tabitha|strong="G5000"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* by \w interpretation|strong="G1329"\w* is \w called|strong="G3004"\w* \w Dorcas|strong="G1393"\w*: \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w woman|strong="G0846"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w full|strong="G4134"\w* of \w good|strong="G0018"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w almsdeeds|strong="G1654"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* she \w did|strong="G4160"\w*.
